amendment.description: To provide for the treatment of programs, projects, and activities within the Joint Military Intelligence Program and Tactical Intelligence and Related Activities programs as of the date of the enactment of the Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 3874 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3874.

Amendment SA 3874 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S10334-10338; text: CR S10334) To provide for the treatment of programs, projects, and activities within the Joint Military Intelligence Program and Tactical Intelligence and Related Activities programs as of the date of the enactment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3874 proposed by Senator Warner.
